Celestial Sigil.name: Celestial Sigil
Celestial Sigil.flavor: An arcane pattern appears briefly on your arms as you snatch power from the cosmos and hurl it toward a foe.
Celestial Sigil.effect: If you hit with this power, you gain an effect based on your current Soul of the Cosmic Cycle phase.
Celestial Sigil.phaseOfTheSun: Enemies within 2 squares of you take fire and radiant damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Celestial Sigil.phaseOfTheMoon: Adjacent enemies take radiant damage equal to your Strength modifier and take a -2 penalty to saving throws until the end of your next turn.
Celestial Sigil.phaseOfTheStars: You teleport a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier as a free action.

Celestial Resistance.name: Celestial Resistance
Celestial Resistance.flavor: You transform your resistance to ward against a different kind of threat.
Celestial Resistance.effect: You can change the resistance granted by your current Soul of the Cosmic Cycle phase to the type of a different phase (cold, psychic, or radiant), or you can increase your resistance against the current type by 5. This benefit lasts until you change your phase.

Celestial Seal.name: Celestial Seal
Celestial Seal.flavor: Your foe is surrounded by celestial lights and held in place by cosmic bindings.
Celestial Seal.onHit: 4d8 + Charisma modifier damage. For this attackâ€™s damage, choose two damage types from among cold, psychic, and radiant.
Celestial Seal.effect: The target is immobilized (save ends). This effect has an additional benefit based on your current Soul of the Cosmic Cycle phase.
Celestial Seal.blazingSun: The target takes fire and radiant damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Celestial Seal.watchingMoon: The target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the end of its next turn.
